name: RED HARVEST (magno chuntey)
description:
Escape from organ harvesters in this short horror game. Sneak and fight your way through a nightmare, keep your organs if you can!

Controls:
WASD: Move
Crouch: C or Shift
Space: Dash
Attack: K or Left Mouse Button
Restart: R

Everything made by me in 48 hours for LD52, for the theme 'Harvest'.

(Download only, I couldn’t get a web build working, sorry)

Changelog:
-Fixed typo in the controls
-Exported Mac and Linux versions
(Original version from before the deadline can be found here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1G7a8HH0jnlUx4SF02dSt4cKN4PaFJtt_/view?usp=share...)
